actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide each taxpayer with an analysis of the proportionate dollar amounts of this tax payment which were spent by the Federal Government, during the latest fiscal year for which data are available, for certain items.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to provide each taxpayer with an analysis of the proportionate dollar amounts of his tax payment which were spent by the Federal Government, during the latest fiscal year for which data is available, for items, enumerated in this Act. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 7517)

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide each taxpayer with an analysis of the proportionate dollar amounts of this tax payment which were spent by the Federal Government, during the latest fiscal year for which data are available, for certain items.
